text: Kogda Isa byl poslan k synam Israila s yavnymi chudesami i yasnymi znameniyami, on im skazal: "YA prishol k vam s mudroy religiyey, prizyvayushchey k yedinobozhiyu. YA raz"yasnyu vam nekotoryye voprosy religii, vyzyvayushchiye u vas raznoglasiya, chtoby vy soshlis' na istine. Boytes' zhe nakazaniya Allakha, povinuytes' mne, sleduya tomu, k chemu ya vas prizyvayu
